participant_1.background:
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.

participant_2.background:
I'm adjusting to my new home in PA, but I'm grateful to have my pets to keep me company.
i like to chat with my friends.
I do yoga to keep my balance.
i like watching ufc fights.
i lift weights , but i never do squats.

content.text: Hi there, I'm [user 1's name], how are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm from [user 1's hometown], what about you?
I'm originally from [user 2's hometown], but I just moved to PA a few months ago.
Oh nice, how are you liking it so far?
It's a bit of a change, but I'm really enjoying it! I love the scenery and the people are so friendly.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're enjoying your new home.
Thanks! I'm sure you'll like it here too, if you ever visit.
I'm sure I would! I've always wanted to see PA.
Well, you're always welcome to come and visit!
Thanks, I might just take you up on that!
